caption:
Black Tech Achievement Awards 2025 ; BTA Gaming Award Winner 🏆💛💃🏾✨

Mannnnnn… I said this 10-Year celebrations will be ABUNDANT and God really said BET 😭🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾

To go home with a BTA award means much more than I ever could have anticipated… and this award in particular I am grateful exists because gaming is so much more than just the act of playing a game. 

The work that has gone into changing how WE get to experience games, whether it’s storytelling or the creative technology that enables us to create ourselves accurately or simply providing the resources to ensure it’s done properly.. has been a PILGRIMAGE!

I am far from done, but thank you to the @btaawards team and judging committee for this reaffirmation of the work gone into making gaming a medium and space where we are at the forefront rather than an afterthought, and can play games without having to guess whether we will really be able make ourselves. 

Here’s to #Ebonix10Years and the community and partners that have fostered the growth, purpose and mission all the way 🥂✨🙏🏾😭

#btaawards2025 #btaawards #blacktechachievementawards #blacktechachievementawards2025 #awardwinning #ebonix
